name: Geo Fight
description:
All Shapes lived together in peace unitl the triangles stole the treasures. Now it´s up to you to restore peace by choosing sides over and over again.

A-D Move

Space -Jump

R - Attack

Left Mouse Click -Skip Dialogue

DEV INFO

This game was made by Birnenlp, and apart from a few drawings, everything, including the music, was made by me.

This is my first Game Jam and the first game i made for Pc.

So feel free to leave a feeback for me, I appriciate it.
